name: Petty Pioneer
description:
Earth has become very ill recently. :(
Your task is to travel to a new planet and don't waste too many rockets on your way.

Graphics & Programming:
Arne and Hauke

Sounds:
Sounds by kenney.nl

Music:
Music by timbeek.com

Font:
Ubuntu by Dalton Maag. See included UFL.txt for more information.

WARNING

This is an experimental build without any menu structure. To exit the game, hit Alt+F4 (no joke).
